reuters.title: ARMSTRONG WORLD <ACK> UNIT BUYS PLANT
reuters.body: Armstrong World Industries Inc said its Gilliam Furniture affiliate has purchased a 130,000 square foot building in Troutman, N.C., for undisclosed terms. It said the new plant is expected to be in operation before year-end and and will more than double Gilliam's production capacity for upholstered furniture. Reuter 
